remarks: If a pair and a class are in a relationship given by a class abstraction of a collection of nested ordered pairs, the involved classes are sets. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jul-2018.)
statement:
oprabv $p |- ( <. X , Y >. { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } Z -> ( X e. _V /\ Y e. _V /\ Z e. _V ) ) $.
$d X x y z $.
$d Y x y z $.
$d Z x y z $.
